p: Generally, the concentrations (%) of α-thujene, α-pinene, camphene, sabinene, β-pinene, α-phellandrene, 3-carene, p-cymene, and limonene in the oil decreased with the increase in the duration of the DT ( Table 1 and Table 2, Figure 2 and Figure 3). On the other side, the concentrations (%) of α-terpinene, γ-terpinene, terpinolene, and myristicin increased with the increase in the duration of the DT ( Table 3, Figure 4).
